<h1 id="一初识points与点材质">一.初识points与点材质</h1>
<p>什么叫做点材质，之前说过所有物体都是有定点的比如一个球体，<strong>并且将材质设置为线框模式</strong>，这个之前就说过所有mesh物体都是由三角形构成，都是有顶点的</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103542279-2014517883.png" alt="image-20241224215046776" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103541901-1632606450.png" alt="image-20241224215103420" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>我们也可以创建点物体，电视材质就不能是普通材质了，<strong>必须要用点材质</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103541511-624954276.png" alt="image-20241224215409051" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103541152-980026217.png" alt="image-20241224215417826" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="11-点材质的属性">1.1 点材质的属性</h2>
<p>比如还可以设置颜色，或者因相机深度而衰减（就是不设置材质大小，一直都是一样大）</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103540791-795389611.png" alt="image-20241224215632458" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103540112-538487021.gif" alt="GIF" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>或者还可以给正方形设置纹理</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103538575-1553367719.png" alt="image-20241224215823147" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>载入纹理并给到点材质</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103538189-861563730.png" alt="image-20241224215932822" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103537780-225216994.png" alt="image-20241224215940771" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>但是现在有个问题，纹理的边缘会把后面的挡住但是挡的不够真实，如果想要真实一点</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103537378-1860777220.png" alt="image-20241224220622278" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>要解决这个首先需要把这个贴图也设置为透明贴图白色不透明，黑色透明，并且还要开启透明</p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103536975-1094230288.png" alt="image-20241224221126985" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/2680817/202412/2680817-20241230103536404-1888208514.png" alt="image-20241224221137239" loading="lazy"></p>
